roleset.name: to spoil by harming
roleset.note: DEFACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deface' based on survey of sentences in ectb2.No VerbNet entry. (from deface.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Passive
example.text: "But who *T* dares * do business online when websites-2 are gettingattacked or defaced *-2?" asked *T* president Kuo Yun at a conferenceon internet security.

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Teenagers defaced the property with graffiti.
